text: You haven't brought up the sword yet.
It makes a great sound when I hit it with my axe!
Okay, but make sure you are able to hit it.
If you don't have an attack ready and he hits you, you'll only get hurt.
Uhh, how do I know if I have an attack ready?
If your magic trail is bright.
The Dragon General's trail is bright green, and mine is bright red.
